statements: SELECT * FROM performance_reports;
SELECT report_id, department_name, team_name FROM performance_reports;
SELECT * FROM performance_reports WHERE performance_rating > 80;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(report_id) FROM performance_reports GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT team_name, AVG(performance_rating) FROM performance_reports GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT * FROM performance_reports WHERE department_name = 'Marketing' ORDER BY report_date DESC, performance_rating ASC;
SELECT department_name, team_name, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM performance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY department_name, team_name;
SELECT report_id, department_name, team_name, performance_rating FROM performance_reports WHERE performance_rating >= 80 ORDER BY department_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT MAX(performance_rating) AS max_rating, MIN(performance_rating) AS min_rating FROM performance_reports;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) AS reports_count FROM performance_reports GROUP BY department_name ORDER BY reports_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM department_performance_reports;
SELECT department_id, performance_score FROM department_performance_reports;
SELECT report_id, department_id, performance_score FROM department_performance_reports WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM team_performance_reports WHERE performance_score > 90;
SELECT report_id, team_id, performance_score FROM team_performance_reports ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM department_performance_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_id, performance_score FROM team_performance_reports WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT department_id, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM department_performance_reports GROUP BY department_id;
SELECT team_id, MAX(performance_score) AS max_score FROM team_performance_reports GROUP BY team_id;
SELECT * FROM department_performance_reports WHERE department_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY performance_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM department_performance;
SELECT department_id, performance_score FROM department_performance ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT team_id, department_id, performance_score FROM team_performance WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance WHERE team_id = 3 ORDER BY performance_score ASC;
SELECT employee_id, performance_score FROM employee_performance WHERE performance_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90;
SELECT * FROM department_performance ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT department_id, MAX(performance_score) AS max_score FROM department_performance GROUP BY department_id;
SELECT dp.department_id, dp.performance_score, tp.team_id FROM department_performance dp INNER JOIN team_performance tp ON dp.department_id = tp.department_id;

SELECT ep.employee_id, tp.team_id, dp.department_id, ep.performance_score FROM employee_performance ep INNER JOIN team_performance tp ON ep.team_id = tp.team_id INNER JOIN department_performance dp ON tp.department_id = dp.department_id WHERE ep.performance_score > 90;
SELECT AVG(dp.performance_score) AS average_score, MIN(ep.performance_score) AS min_score FROM department_performance dp LEFT JOIN employee_performance ep ON dp.department_id = ep.team_id;
SELECT * FROM departments;
SELECT department_name FROM departments ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name FROM employees WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT report_date, performance_rating FROM performance_reports WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT team_name FROM teams WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT name, team_id FROM employees WHERE team_id = 2 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, name, performance_rating FROM employees INNER JOIN performance_reports ON employees.employee_id = performance_reports.employee_id WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE department_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT team_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM teams JOIN employees ON teams.team_id = employees.team_id GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT * FROM department_performance_reports;
SELECT report_id, department_name FROM department_performance_reports WHERE performance_rating > 80;
SELECT team_name, report_date FROM team_performance_reports WHERE performance_rating < 60 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, performance_rating FROM employee_performance WHERE department_id = 1 AND team_id = 2;
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM department WHERE department_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM department_performance_reports WHERE performance_rating > 3 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT department_name, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM department_performance_reports GROUP BY department_name HAVING avg_rating > 4 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;

SELECT employee_name, department_name, team_name FROM employee_performance JOIN department ON employee_performance.department_id = department.department_id JOIN team ON employee_performance.team_id = team.team_id WHERE department_name = 'Finance' AND performance_rating < 3;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM team_performance_reports GROUP BY team_name HAVING total_reports > 2 ORDER BY total_reports DESC;

SELECT team_name, department_name, performance_rating FROM team_performance_reports JOIN team ON team_performance_reports.report_id = team.team_id JOIN department ON team.department_id = department.department_id WHERE performance_rating = (SELECT MAX(performance_rating) FROM team_performance_reports);
